      Methods in extra with parameters of type Protocol.Extension 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String Protocol.login(java.lang.String username, Protocol.Extension[] extensions)

      [SERVER] Indicate that the login was successful, supplying extensions that are supported on the server.
